title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Jun 23rd thru Jun
description:
Six more broadcasts of C2C for all the fans out there. I am early this week. I hope you all enjoy the shows and share them all. Thanks in advance to all the seeders and those loyal fans who continue to download my torrents. Stokeman Out....

Monday June 23rd, 2008
Occult Parallels
Appearing during the first two hours, historian of esoterica, Peter Levenda discussed his new book Stairway to Heaven, which connects occult knowledge across time, civilizations, and secret societies. The number seven and its relation to heaven or... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Peter Levenda

Tuesday June 24th, 2008
Time Travel & Parallel Universes
Expert in hypnosis and time travel, Dr. Bruce Goldberg discussed visiting parallel universes, teleportation, and time travel. Research at Stanford University regarding inflation theory supports the idea of parallel universes, he reported. Such alternative... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Dr. Bruce Goldberg, Christian Wilde, Dr. Robert Zubrin

Wednesday June 25th, 2008
UFO Disclosure & Mars Theories
UFO disclosure was addressed by two guests. In the second hour, Disclosure Project witness Dan Willis shared his testimony that he presented at the 2001 conference. In 1969, he was a code operator and translated a coded message from a Navy ship off... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Douglas Hagmann, Tom Van Flandern, Dan Willis, Stephen Bassett

Thursday June 26th, 2008
Crop Circles, Oceans, ETs & UFOs
Investigative reporter Linda Moulton Howe presented reports on the Barbury Castle pattern, ocean acidity, an abductee&#039;s account of non-human technologies, and the U.K&#039;s recent UFO flap. She interviewed astrophysicist Mike Reed about the Barbury Castle... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Linda Moulton Howe, Gerald Celente

Saturday June 28th, 2008
Aleister Crowley
Ian spoke with professor of history Dr. Richard Spence about his new book, Agent 666: Aleister Crowley, British Intelligence and the Occult. Full recap to follow...
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Richard B. Spence

Sunday June 29th, 2008
Bigfoot in Ancient Texts
Ian Punnett welcomed expert in ancient manuscripts, Glenn Kimball, who discussed evidence for intelligent &#039;ape people&#039; (or Bigfoot) in 2,000 year-old texts. Specifically, he cited a document written by the Essenes called &#039;Dadam and Mueve,&#039; which he said... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Glenn Kimball
